profile.title: Professional profile
profile.text: Ssr. full stack web developer with 6+ years of experience. With a problem-solving oriented profile and great learning capabilities, I gradually incorporated different languages and frameworks into my stack. I mainly worked with PHP (Symfony) and Java (Spring Boot) on the backend and with Vue.js as the JavaScript framework on the frontend.

list.position: Web developer at "Colegio de Escribanos de la Provincia de Buenos Aires" (Notary Public Association)
list.description: As a developer, I took part in analysis and development of new applications and webservices. We switched from a monolytic approach to an ecosystem with multiple APIs, databases and web apps.

tasks.subtitle: Main activities:
list: Frontend applications with Vue.js and Tailwind CSS.
RESTful APIs development with Spring Boot (Java).
Minor developments with Node.js (websockets management with socket.io and PDF generation whit Puppeteer).

list.position: Web developer at "Dirección Provincial de Sistemas de Información y Tecnologías" (Buenos Aires Province government)
list.description: Member of the development team assigned to modernize organization's web applications and services. I progressively gained experience until I became one of the key references on the team, helping and training new developers.

tasks.subtitle: Main activities:
list: PHP 5.3 legacy applications maintenance. Redisign with Materialize CSS and jQuery.
Slim Framework used to expose SOAP webservices as REST APIs.
MVC applications with Symfony (PHP). Frontends with Vue.js and Materialize CSS.
